conbody.p: This section provides you a usage example on how to upload KatalonDemoProject packaged in JUnit by sideload and start a test run in App Center Test.

ol.li: Clone or download sideload from our repository: Katalon Studio sideload.

li.p: Open the workspace of the usage example project by following the path: src/test/resources/KatalonDemoProject.zip.
On App Center Test, create and start a new test run. See Microsoft documentation: Starting a test run.

ul.li: Device: Android 7.1.1 or prior. Ex: Motorola Nexus 6

li.p: To pack your sideload project, execute the file package.bat/package.sh.

ul.li: Before uploading, you should configure in the file upload.sh/upload.bat.
To upload and run your sideload project on the App Center, execute the file upload.sh/upload.bat.

li.p: You can view test reports on App Center Test. See Microsoft documentation: Test reports.
